com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium

Interface NotificationHandler


  • public interface NotificationHandler
    The handler interface for receiving browser HTML5 desktop common notification events. To receive browser notification events user should register the {@link NotificationHandler} implementation invoking the setNotificationHandler() method of the NotificationService. Appropriate handler methods implemented will be invoked when browser performs notification actions.
    处理程序接口，用于接收浏览器HTML5桌面常见通知事件。要接收浏览器通知事件，用户应注册{@link NotificationHandler}实现，以调用NotificationService的setNotificationHandler（）方法。当浏览器执行通知操作时，将调用实现的适当处理程序方法。

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onShowNotification(NotificationEvent event)
      Invoked when browser informs that a new notification should be displayed.
      当浏览器通知应显示新的通知时调用。

    • Method Detail

      • onShowNotification

        void onShowNotification(NotificationEvent event)
        Invoked when browser informs that a new notification should be displayed.
        当浏览器通知应显示新的通知时调用。
        Parameters:
        event - NotificationEvent will contain information about notification that should be displayed. -将包含有关应显示的通知的信息。
